roleset.name: make a high tinny sound
roleset.note: TINKLE-V NOTES: framed by Ben. Member of Vncls sound_emission-43.2. VN, FN updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from tinkle.01-v)

example.name: alcohol
example.text: He came through from the Fleet Bar , which was stag , with the ice cubes tinkling in a glass he carried .
